Oscar is adamant that if Amooti hadn't made Amara jealous, she wouldn't have attempted to harm Sanyu and their baby.

Sanyu is convinced that Abimala attempted to harm her son with herbs, while Patrick strongly disagrees, pleading for Abimala's release.
